participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Reflective and somewhat introverted, Evelyn is deeply thoughtful about her past and her aspirations. She values family but struggles with their expectations.
participant_1.background: I am not comfortable talking about my parents' death. My family loves me, but keeps their distance. I'm not sure if my parents would approve of my dream to go to Mars. I think the moon landing was faked. My family is close-knit and we enjoy spending time together, especially on sunny days.

participant_2.name: Lucas
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and sociable, Lucas enjoys nurturing relationships with friends and family, and he is optimistic about finding love.
participant_2.background: I'm at a healthy weight. My family and friends are my favorite people because they are always there for me, no matter what. I love to show my friends the sunflowers I grow. I'm hoping to find someone to marry me. I don't dye my hair because I like my natural color.

content.text: My day is going good! I just got back from a run.
That's great! I wish I could run, but I am not a very athletic person.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the movies and I like to read.
I love to read too! What are your favorite books?
My favorite book is The Great Gatsby.
I have never read that book. What is it about?
It's about a man who goes back to his hometown and falls in love with a married woman.
That sounds interesting. I might have to check it out.
You should! It's a great book.
What do you like about it?
I like the way the author writes about love. It's very romantic.
Me too! I think that's why I love The Great Gatsby so much.
I'm going to have to read it now!
